description: All-in-One Sandalwood Skincare Shaving and Bath Gift Basket Set for Men with Hemp Oil Extract
One of the best Gentleman’s Gift Set for skincare, shave, bath and shower

Sandalwood essential oil is derived from the steam distillation of the wood from the sandalwood tree. Expertly formulated with sandalwood essential oil to help soothes the skin, relieves it from inflammation and irritation, and keeps you feeling fresh and cool.

Hemp oil extract riches the natural source vitamins (including B1, B2, B6 and D), trace minerals (including calcium, iron, magnesium, potassium and zinc), and omega 6 and 3 fatty acids with a balanced and healthy 3 to 1 ratio.
+ Shaving Cream - 4 fl.oz Pleasant and smooth shave - Enjoy your daily shaving routine
+ Aftershave Balm (500MG Hemp Oil Extract) - 4 fl.oz Ultra soothing - Replenish moisture to soothe dry skin after shaving
+ Bubble Bath – 8.4 fl.oz Soft and smooth skin - Great for everyday bath routine
+ Bath Salts (500MG Hemp Oil Extract) – 6.76 oz Relaxing and balance the skin
